en.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
en.author: – Peter Drucker

en.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
en.author: – Steve Jobs

en.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
en.author: – Steve Jobs

en.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
en.author: – Jim Rohn

en.quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk.
en.author: – Mark Zuckerberg

en.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
en.author: – Henry David Thoreau

en.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
en.author: – John D. Rockefeller

en.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
en.author: – Thomas Jefferson

en.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
en.author: – Albert Schweitzer

en.quote: Success isn’t just about what you accomplish in your life; it’s about what you inspire others to do.
en.author: – Unknown

en.quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
en.author: – Japanese Proverb

en.quote: Some people dream of success while others wake up and work.
en.author: – Unknown

en.quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
en.author: – Zig Ziglar

en.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
en.author: – Franklin D. Roosevelt

en.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
en.author: – Eleanor Roosevelt

en.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
en.author: – Mark Twain

en.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
en.author: – Vince Lombardi

en.quote: I failed my way to success.
en.author: – Thomas Edison

en.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
en.author: – Vidal Sassoon

en.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
en.author: – Steve Jobs

en.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
en.author: – Walt Disney

en.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
en.author: – Sam Levenson

en.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
en.author: – Wayne Gretzky

en.quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
en.author: – Jimmy Johnson

en.quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.
en.author: – Chris Grosser

en.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
en.author: – Winston Churchill

en.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
en.author: – Colin R. Davis

en.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
en.author: – Bo Bennett

en.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
en.author: – Herman Melville

en.quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
en.author: – Michael Jordan

en.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
en.author: – Winston Churchill

en.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
en.author: – Theodore Roosevelt

en.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
en.author: – Franklin D. Roosevelt

en.quote: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
en.author: – Malcolm X

en.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
en.author: – Bruce Lee

en.quote: Don’t be distracted by criticism. Remember – the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.
en.author: – Zig Ziglar

en.quote: There is no elevator to success – you have to take the stairs.
en.author: – Unknown

en.quote: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don’t wish it were easier; wish you were better.
en.author: – Jim Rohn

en.quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
en.author: – Unknown

en.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
en.author: – Charles Kingsleigh

en.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
en.author: – John Wooden

en.quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
en.author: – Unknown

en.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
en.author: – Jim Rohn

en.quote: Trust because you are willing to accept the risk, not because it’s safe or certain.
en.author: – Unknown

en.quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life – think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
en.author: – Swami Vivekananda

en.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
en.author: – Walt Disney

en.quote: Good things come to people who wait, but better things come to those who go out and get them.
en.author: – Unknown

en.quote: If you do what you always did, you will get what you always got.
en.author: – Unknown

en.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
en.author: – Albert Schweitzer

en.quote: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was ending, he turned into a butterfly.
en.author: – Proverb

en.quote: Successful entrepreneurs are givers and not takers of positive energy.
en.author: – Unknown

en.quote: Whenever you see a successful person, you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
en.author: – Vaibhav Shah

en.quote: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
en.author: – Chris Grosser

en.quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
en.author: – Albert Einstein

en.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
en.author: – Eleanor Roosevelt

en.quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
en.author: – Thomas A. Edison

en.quote: If you don’t value your time, neither will others. Stop giving away your time and talents – start charging for it.
en.author: – Kim Garst

en.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
en.author: – David Brinkley

en.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
en.author: – Eleanor Roosevelt

en.quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one’s destiny to do, and then do it.
en.author: – Henry Ford

en.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
en.author: – Winston Churchill

en.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
en.author: – Oscar Wilde

en.quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
en.author: – Bruce Feirstein

en.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
en.author: – John D. Rockefeller

en.quote: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
en.author: – Dalai Lama

en.quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
en.author: – Anonymous

en.quote: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
en.author: – Anonymous

en.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
en.author: – Frank Sinatra

en.quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
en.author: – Thomas Edison

en.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
en.author: – Wayne Gretzky

en.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
en.author: – Henry Ford

en.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
en.author: – Vidal Sassoon

en.quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
en.author: – Muhammad Ali

en.quote: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.
en.author: – Benjamin Franklin

en.quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
en.author: – Roy T. Bennett

en.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
en.author: – Ralph Waldo Emerson

en.quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
en.author: – Charles Darwin

en.quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
en.author: – Albert Einstein

en.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
en.author: – Eleanor Roosevelt

en.quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
en.author: – Bill Cosby

en.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
en.author: – John D. Rockefeller

en.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
en.author: – Bruce Lee

en.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
en.author: – Dale Carnegie

en.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
en.author: – Walt Disney

en.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
en.author: – Franklin D. Roosevelt

en.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
en.author: – Herman Melville

en.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
en.author: – Steve Jobs

en.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
en.author: – Colin R. Davis

en.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
en.author: – Thomas Jefferson

en.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
en.author: – Henry David Thoreau

en.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
en.author: – Sam Levenson

en.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
en.author: – Bo Bennett

en.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
en.author: – Charles Kingsleigh

en.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
en.author: – Eleanor Roosevelt

en.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
en.author: – Confucius

en.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
en.author: – C.S. Lewis

en.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
en.author: – George Addair

en.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
en.author: – Norman Vaughan

en.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
en.author: – Colin Powell

en.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it’s the persistence through failure.
en.author: – Aisha Tyler

en.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it’s a failure, you will fail above everyone else’s success.
en.author: – James Cameron

en.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
en.author: – Winston Churchill

en.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
en.author: – Winston Churchill

en.quote: Don’t be distracted by criticism. Remember – the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.
en.author: – Zig Ziglar

en.quote: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
en.author: – Estee Lauder

en.quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
en.author: – Richard Branson

en.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.

en.author: – Winston Churchill

en.quote: Don’t be distracted by criticism. Remember – the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.
en.author: – Zig Ziglar

en.quote: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
en.author: – Estee Lauder

en.quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
en.author: – Richard Branson

en.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
en.author: – Roy T. Bennett

en.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
en.author: – Bo Bennett

en.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
en.author: – Franklin D. Roosevelt

en.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
en.author: – Eleanor Roosevelt

en.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
en.author: – Confucius

en.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
en.author: – C.S. Lewis

en.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
en.author: – George Addair

en.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
en.author: – Norman Vaughan

en.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
en.author: – Colin Powell

en.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it’s the persistence through failure.
en.author: – Aisha Tyler

en.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it’s a failure, you will fail above everyone else’s success.
en.author: – James Cameron

en.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
